Rulings.Base: 1. As long as your 'Scrap' monster is in Defense Position during damage calculation, you can activate "Scrap Rage". It does not have to be in Defense Position when it is selected as an attack target.\n2. If the 'Scrap' monster is not destroyed by this effect at the end of the Battle Phase, it loses the 2000 DEF gained from "Scrap Rage".
